alert.note: Alert for Carter; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:13PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Carter and northeastern Powder River Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Ridgeway, or 26 miles south of Ekalaka, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, penny size hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Powderville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
